mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment ( seq, board_seq, parent_seq, content, reg_id, reg_dt, mod_dt, is_modded, recommend ) VALUES ( comment_seq.nextVal, #{boardSeq}, #{parentSeq}, #{content}, #{regId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, board_seq as boardSeq, parent_seq as parentSeq, content, reg_id as regId, reg_dt as regDt, mod_dt as modDt, is_modded as isModded, recommend FROM board_comment Where seq = #{seq}

SELECT c.seq, c.board_seq as boardSeq, c.parent_seq as parentSeq, c.content, c.reg_id as regId, c.reg_dt as regDt, c.mod_dt as modDt, c.is_modded as isModded, c.recommend FROM board_comment c, board b Where #{boardSeq} = b.seq And c.board_seq = b.seq
mapper.update: UPDATE board_comment SET content = #{content}, mod_dt = SYSDATE, is_modded = 1, recommend = #{recommend} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_comment WHERE seq = #{seq} And reg_id = #{regId}
